F, as it happens - I think your piece in Slate is headlined a FUBAR -that's a military acronym that might stand for fouled up beyond all reason.
FUBAR - it's a term you hear a lot in the Army.
That's right.

And I was a little bit uncomfortable with the flurry of legislation of Congress trying to regulate major-league baseball.

It could have been that Rafael used the drug unbeknowing.
It could have been in an acne medicine and it laid in his blood.
